transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Haan ji sir, Lakshman baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan, Lakshman ji.

Executive: Ji sir. Aap Harsh Agarwal se bol raha hun.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Oh, main aapse subah ek cheez puchna bhul gaya tha main.

Executive: Boliye sir.

Customer: Ye jo IndiaMART mein ek option aata hai malum hai leads kya hai idhar. Ah.

Customer: Tenders wala.

Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Hai na?

Executive: Ji bilkul aata hai. Iska iska kya hissa rehta hai iska matlab? Iska kuch samajh mein nahi aata hai.

Executive: Iska matlab ye hota hai sir jitne bhi matlab government tenders provide karti hai. Matlab jitne bhi tender leke aati hai man ke chalo kisi office mein ya fir usme kuch accessories ki avashyakta hai man ke chalo copy pen vagaira ki avashyakta hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To uske liye bid unka budget hota hai ek sir fix.

Customer: To.

Executive: To jo company jo company unhe us budget ke andar matlab products provide karti hai wo uske liye bid karti hai matlab uske liye ye hota hai sir tenders ka.

Customer: Abhi.

Executive: Man ke chalo ji. Abhi dekho main jaise maine open kiya mera isme pehla tenders aa raha hai amethyst stone ka.

Executive: Achcha.

Customer: Patna Bihar.

Executive: Haan ji sir. To tender value hai 3 lakh 90 hajar.

Customer: Haan. To isme kya hoga sir jitne bhi aapke matlab competitors honge wo bhi iske liye bid karenge. Aap jitne kam mein apne customer ko ye provide kar sakoge wo usse maal kharidega iska matlab ye hota hai.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Isme details details puri nahi di hoti iske andar.

Executive: Details sir actually kya hai ki maine aapki profile nahi khol rakhi hai main khol leta hun ek minute. Main dekh nahi pa raha hun main khol leta hun. 3 lakh 90 hajar mein quantity kitni hai kya hai wo to malum hi nahi padta na.

Executive: Sir unki jo matlab kya hai ek minute main khol leta hun aise pata nahi chalega. Haan.

Executive: Sir aap na us pe connect ho na sir kal aapko video meet pe matlab main aapko samjha dunga kya kya hai kaise hai. Waise main aapko ek idea de deta hun ye aisa hi hota hai jaise ki man ke chalo aapko kisi cheez ki requirement hai to aap aapke liye jaise ki bolte hai na ki boli lagwate hai to us tarike se.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan wo us tarike se kaam karta hai. Haan kisi clients ki requirement hai wo big requirement hai to wo ko dekhta hai jo us products mein deal karte hain to kya hai usme bahut sare jo aapke competitors honge wo participate karte hain usme se. To jo matlab kam se kam usme us products ko deliver karega wo usse mil jayega aap uske liye aapko unse baat karni padegi ki kya aapki requirement hai kya aapka wo hai matlab kya aapko chahiye ye hota hai sir.

Customer: Theek hai samajh gaya main. Samajh gaye sir? To latest tender pe main gaya aapki taraf aur mujhe jaise dikha raha hai iski 3 lakh 90 hajar ek value hai.

Customer: Haan. Quantity quantity inko chahiye 84877 MST stones ki jo inka inko jo product hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Inko MST stone chahiye 8000 84877 theek hai sir aur ye 14 November ye 14 November ko aaya tha tender aur ye 24 November 2025 ko khatam ho jayega. To aap ye kya hai ki inse contact kar sakte hain aap inse baat kar sakte hain ki agar aap itna itne aap itne MST MST stone agar inhe provide kar sakte hain.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Kam se kam kam se kam price pe to aap inse yahan yahan pe jaake inse baat kar sakte hain iska matlab ye hai is isme isme aur kuch details hoti hai kya jaise MST stone mein inko chahiye kya raw chahiye ki kya cheez hai matlab wo nahi batate andar.

Executive: Sir actually na ye aapko na view tender information mein jaake pata chalega itna nahi pata chalega isme bhi.

Customer: Achcha achcha. To ye abhi main ye tender view tender information abhi ye maine kar liya ye view details kari uske baad inko contact karne ke liye kya aata hai number wo.

Executive: Achcha. Haan haan. Is pe aapne view tender information pe kiya kya dikha raha hai waha pe kya dikha raha hai waha pe?

Customer: Pura bahut bada form hi khul gaya pura.

Executive: Form form khul gaya to sir isme aapko shayad isme kya mang raha hai aapki details mang raha hai kya?

Customer: Nahi nahi meri to koi details nahi mang raha main aapko send karta hun. Form form form mein kya khula hai aapko?

Customer: Form mein tender details hai important dates hai reference number hai fir tender source hai bahut sara kuch hai.

Executive: Sir wo please mujhe share kar dijiye WhatsApp number pe kya kya kya mang raha hai tabhi main aapko bata paunga kyunki aap hai WhatsApp number ye mera yahi mera WhatsApp number hai.

Executive: Aise hi aise hi niche dikha raha hai isko 28 din bache hain ye sare tenders hain sir aapke product se related. Ye aapko message aaya dekho India mein maine kiya kuch.

Executive: Hello sir abhi nahi aaya hai. Aapki taraf se message bhejiye mujhe ek WhatsApp. Achcha. Mere paas number hai wo purana number hai shayad.

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji sir. Hello. Hello. Haan sir 82 8247 22 8641 aapka hi number hai WhatsApp number hai?

Customer: Hello. 82 nahi ye mera nahi hai.

Executive: To dekh raha hun. Mera number hai 7383 80 80 8047 22 22 nahi nahi mera number hai 7383 nahi hai ek minute sir aap apna mujhe na main aap aap apna number boliye sir ek minute. 7383

Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Aawaz aa rahi hai sir aapko? Sir apna number boliye WhatsApp number. 7383

Executive: Hello. Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about tenders in IndiaMART.

- Details are not fully available in tenders.

- Unable to find quantity details in tender.

- Asks about details in MST stone tender.

- Asks for contact details after view details.



Resolution:

- Explained about government tenders and bidding process.

- Explained how competitors bid for tenders.

- Executive offered to explain on a video call.

- Explained how to contact the client.

- Asked customer to share details on WhatsApp.

- Asked customer to send a WhatsApp message.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, bid, mst stone, whatsapp
